remarks: Membership in the range of an operation class abstraction.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement:

elrnmpt2g $p |- ( D e. V -> ( D e. ran F <-> E. x e. A E. y e. B D = C ) ) $.
